article.Heading: Union Budget 2016-17: Aptech up 4%; govt to set up high education financing agency
article.Summary: Shares of Aptech gained 4 percent intraday Monday as government announced the setting up of high education financing agency with Rs 1000 crore capital.
article.Body:
Moneycontrol Bureau

Shares of Aptech gained 4 percent intraday Monday as government announced the setting up of high education financing agency with Rs 1000 crore capital.

At 14:07 hrs Aptech was quoting at Rs 53.80, down Rs 0.05, or 0.09 percent.
